Key Recommendations: Add a CONTRIBUTING.md file with guidelines for potential contributors; Add API documentation describing all functions/methods with example inputs and outputs; Add example code demonstrating real-world usage of the software; Set up continuous integration (e.g., GitHub Actions) to automatically run tests
Almanack Score Description: Score ranges from 0 to 1, where 0 means no tests passed and 1 means all tests passed. For example, 0.75 indicates 75% of the tests that were run passed successfully.
